channel.title: Adding customs?

item.title: Adding customs?
item.dc:creator: @ModelLove ModelLove
item.description:
@ModelLove wrote:

[b]I can’t see anything wrong with anything i’ve done.

Added the models.
Added the INTS.
Added it into item.cfg.
Saved and compiled.
Ran server.
“add model 1300” and “add model 1301”.
::item 14982 1
Dwarf remain null :/…

[/b]

item.title: Adding customs?
item.dc:creator: @ModelLove ModelLove
item.description:
@ModelLove wrote:

[b][color=navy]Sorry if this is in the wrong section, it’s my first ever post.

Recently, I’ve been creating some models. I designed a quick Samurai Sword. I’ve Gzipped it and added it into my models folder(Client sided).

Then I had to create my INTS - Something I can’t do very well, I had a good go.
Here is what I got -

if(i == 14982) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 1300; //Model Drop/inv view class8.anInt181 = 789; class8.anInt190 = 240; class8.anInt198 = 60; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 5; class8.anInt197 = 120; class8.anInt165 = 1301; //male wearing class8.anInt200 = 1301; //female wearing class8.anInt164 = -1; //Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1; //male arms/sleeves class8.anInt175 = 65; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Samurai Sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A sword used by the Samurai's.".getBytes(); }

[b]When I went in-game and typed “add model 1300” and “add model 1301” it gave me the sM “Model added successfully.”
Then, when I try to spawn the Samurai Sword all I get is Dwarf remains(null).
I guess my INTS are wrong.

Any help is appreciated!

NOTE - YES, I’ve added it into item.cfg!

Thank You -
Tom.
[/b]

Read full topic
